ToScancode(InputKey)

Returns the corresponding SDL2.SDL.SDL_Scancode for a given InputKey.

public static SDL.SDL_Scancode ToScancode(this InputKey inputKey)

Parameters

inputKey InputKey

Should be a keyboard key.

Returns

SDL.SDL_Scancode

The corresponding SDL2.SDL.SDL_Scancode if the InputKey is valid. SDL2.SDL.SDL_Scancode.SDL_SCANCODE_UNKNOWN otherwise.

TryGetStringFromBytePointer(byte*, out string)

Converts a UTF-8 byte pointer to a string.

public static bool TryGetStringFromBytePointer(byte* bytePointer, out string str)

Parameters

bytePointer byte*

Pointer to UTF-8 encoded byte array.

str string

The resulting string

Returns

bool

true if the bytePointer was successfully converted to a string.

Remarks

Most commonly used with SDL text events.

TryGetTouchName(SDL_TouchFingerEvent, out string)

Gets the name of the touch device for this SDL2.SDL.SDL_TouchFingerEvent.

public static bool TryGetTouchName(this SDL.SDL_TouchFingerEvent e, out string name)

Parameters

e SDL.SDL_TouchFingerEvent
name string

Returns

bool

Remarks

On Windows, this will return "touch" for touchscreen events or "pen" for pen/tablet events.
